name: Color Summoners
description:
Outwit your opponent and reduce their life points to zero!

Simultaneous Turn-Based Gameplay
Instead of taking turns, both players declare and resolve actions simultaneously. This means you must constantly anticipate your opponent's moves and make strategic decisions on the fly.
Simple Cards, Powerful Combos

Each card has a simple yet powerful effect, leading to a wide variety of combo possibilities. Discover and master devastating combos to outplay your opponent.
No Rare Cards, No P2W
Forget about common cards being inferior to rare ones! This game has no rarity system. Every card is carefully balanced, and victory depends on your ability to read your opponent and build powerful combos.

Free to Play
We want everyone to enjoy this game, so it's completely free to play.

Play with Friends or Strangers
Use the matchmaking system to find online opponents or create custom matches to play with friends.

Join the Community
Join our Discord server to find opponents, make friends, and discuss the game.

Respect

This game is a modified reproduction of a Flash card game called "Card Commander" which is no longer available.
I am not affiliated with the original creator of Card Commander, "hozo", but I would like to express my gratitude for his work.
